after this new update this app disconected with infiniti flight always what's the problem
replyContent:
Please check http://dontkillmyapp.com for instructions how to stop your device from shutting down background services like IF-A and IF's plugin service. Android unfortunately has introduced lots of problems in their latest updates for apps that run in the background.

If that doesn't help, please email me for further support! I'd love to help.

content: Awesome one here, it definitely work! Some people say they don't work. They need to open the this app first and then open IF and turn ON the "Enable Infinite Flight Connect". It that simple. Btw, great job!

Whenever I use the app, when I for example get 80 knots in infinite flight, it cuts out the start of the word. For example, instead of saying 80 Knots, it says "e-knots". content: Where do I start, downloaded this app after reading some reviews and decided to give it a try, considering it's already a little pricey I went ahead anyway and purchased it. Please don't think you get access to all the various voice commands with you purchase because you don't. To buy the further voice packs is going to cost you ¬£16+ which in theory costs more to purchase than the standalone infinite flight app. Now the voice packs you hear are very shoddy indeed, it sounds like it's been rushed and put together by a 10 year old child doesn't (in my opinion) sound very professional at all. I emailed John (developer) to request a refund as there is no trial period to check out the app for myself, so I have to take the reviews placed online as gospel, now John took his time to reply to my email due to some mess up with him not receiving emails and on his reply he has stated he does not provide ant refunds for his products purchased. Now I think this is a extremely poor way to treat people, lure them in to buy the "extras" then when people have tried out the app for themselves and see it's not worth the price they have paid he refuses to refund them. But rest assured I will find a way to get my money back even if I have to claim through my bank as a charge back. I've now had the app for a around 2 months and been trying since to get my money back through emailing him and having no success.. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU LIKE BEING TREATED LIKE DIRT AND WHEN YOU REALISE THIS IS JUST A SIMPLE NOT WORTH ITS VALUE APP YOU WILL WISH YOU NEVER PAID FOR IT... SAVE YOURSELF ALL THE HASSLE AND BOTHER THAT I'M GOING THROUGH AND DON'T DOWNLOAD... and just a final note, if you come t something that John doesn't like he will reply back to you with some sarcasm and out you on the Infinite Flight Community all because he doesn't like hearing the truth about his not so "cool" app.   Rant over
replyContent:
Wow. You are by far the most passionate critic of this app - so sorry you feel this way.

In our emails, I was as respectful as I knew how to be, and to be very clear: I've never outed anyone on the IF Forum, not sure where you got this information.

I sincerely hope you were able to get your refund worked out. I do not provide personal refunds.

content: Great app, great developer who wants help the people who buy it. I approve üëç
replyContent:
1. Make sure in-flight assistant and infinite flight are running on the same device. 
2. Make sure the setting ‚ÄúEnable Infinite Flight connect" is on in infinite flight's settings. Double-check, please!
3. Try rebooting your device. Then start in-flight assistant. And start infinite flight.
4. Make sure Power Saving is off.
